meanings.sent1: The robot's reprogrammable software allowed it to learn new tasks easily.
meanings.sent2: The reprogrammable remote control could be customized to work with different devices.
meanings.sent3: I wish my brain was reprogrammable so I could instantly learn new languages.
meanings.sent4: Her mind was like a reprogrammable computer, always ready to adapt to new information.
meanings.sent5: The reprogrammable nature of the toy made it a favorite among tech-savvy kids.

meanings.definition: Able to be changed or modified through programming.
meanings.sent1: The reprogrammable thermostat allowed us to adjust the temperature from anywhere.
meanings.sent2: The reprogrammable security system could be updated to add new features.
meanings.sent3: My reprogrammable alarm clock decided to wake me up an hour early as a prank.
meanings.sent4: His reprogrammable personality made him a hit at parties, always adapting to the mood.
meanings.sent5: The reprogrammable nature of the software made it a valuable tool for developers.
